oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John Eaton
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Reprinted portrait of John Henry Eaton (1790-1856). In the headshot he is wearing a jacket with a large collar and neckwear. One eyebrow is raised.
Andrew Jackson's confidante, Sec. of War, and husband of the controversial Margaret "Peggy" Timberlake O'Neale Eaton.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Eaton, John Henry, 1790-1856
Collars; Politicians; American political leaders
Cabinet officers; Military officers; Neckwear
